div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Immunization|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Immunization` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Immunization`. Element `Immunization` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization`.
Element `Immunization.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.meta`.
Element `Immunization.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.implicitRules`.
Element `Immunization.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.language`.
Element `Immunization.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.text`.
Element `Immunization.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.contained`.
Element `Immunization.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.identifier`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Immunization.basedOn` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Immunization.basedOn` is will have a context of Immunization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Immunization`.
Element `Immunization.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.status`.
Element `Immunization.statusReason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.statusReason`.
Element `Immunization.vaccineCode` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.vaccineCode`.
Element `Immunization.administeredProduct` is will have a context of Immunization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Immunization`.
Element `Immunization.manufacturer` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.manufacturer`.
Element `Immunization.lotNumber` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.lotNumber`.
Element `Immunization.expirationDate` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.expirationDate`.
Element `Immunization.patient` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.patient`.
Element `Immunization.encounter` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.encounter`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Immunization.supportingInformation` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Immunization.supportingInformation` is will have a context of Immunization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Immunization`.

Note that the target element context `Immunization.occurrence[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Immunization`. Element `Immunization.occurrence[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.occurrence[x]`. Note that the target element context `Immunization.occurrence[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Immunization`.
Element `Immunization.primarySource` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.primarySource`.
Element `Immunization.informationSource` is will have a context of Immunization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Immunization`.
Element `Immunization.location` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.location`.
Element `Immunization.site` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.site`.
Element `Immunization.route` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.route`.
Element `Immunization.doseQuantity` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.doseQuantity`.
Element `Immunization.performer` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.performer`.
Element `Immunization.performer.function` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.performer.function`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Immunization.performer.actor` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Immunization.performer.actor` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.performer.actor`.
Element `Immunization.note` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.note`.
Element `Immunization.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.reasonCode`. Element `Immunization.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.reasonReference`.
Element `Immunization.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.reasonCode`. Element `Immunization.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.reasonReference`.
Element `Immunization.isSubpotent` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.isSubpotent`.
Element `Immunization.subpotentReason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.subpotentReason`.
Element `Immunization.programEligibility` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.programEligibility`.
Element `Immunization.programEligibility.program` is will have a context of Immunization.programEligibility based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Immunization`.
Element `Immunization.programEligibility.programStatus` is will have a context of Immunization.programEligibility based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Immunization`.
Element `Immunization.fundingSource` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.fundingSource`.
Element `Immunization.reaction` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.reaction`.
Element `Immunization.reaction.date` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.reaction.date`.
Element `Immunization.reaction.manifestation` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.reaction.detail`.
Element `Immunization.reaction.reported` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.reaction.reported`.
Element `Immunization.protocolApplied` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.protocolApplied`.
Element `Immunization.protocolApplied.series` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.protocolApplied.series`.
Element `Immunization.protocolApplied.authority` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.protocolApplied.authority`.
Element `Immunization.protocolApplied.targetDisease` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.protocolApplied.targetDisease`.

Note that the target element context `Immunization.protocolApplied.doseNumber[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Immunization.protocolApplied`. Element `Immunization.protocolApplied.doseNumber` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.protocolApplied.doseNumber[x]`. Note that the target element context `Immunization.protocolApplied.doseNumber[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Immunization.protocolApplied`.

Note that the target element context `Immunization.protocolApplied.seriesDoses[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Immunization.protocolApplied`. Element `Immunization.protocolApplied.seriesDoses` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.protocolApplied.seriesDoses[x]`. Note that the target element context `Immunization.protocolApplied.seriesDoses[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Immunization.protocolApplied`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
